entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Light snow and local blowing snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
